an5.138:1.1: “Mendicants, a royal bull elephant with five factors eats food, takes up space, drops dung, and takes a ticket, yet is still reckoned a royal bull elephant.
an5.138:1.3: It’s when a royal bull elephant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.138:1.4: A royal bull elephant with these five factors eats food, takes up space, drops dung, and takes a ticket, yet is still reckoned a royal bull elephant.
an5.138:2.1: In the same way, a mendicant with five qualities eats food, takes up space, tramples beds and chairs, and takes a ticket, yet is still reckoned a mendicant.
an5.138:2.3: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.138:2.4: A mendicant with these five qualities eats food, takes up space, tramples beds and chairs, and takes a ticket, yet is still reckoned a mendicant.”
